overview:
Mariano is the CEO at Mural.ly, a website with BIG flexible playspaces to collect and map media & files from the Web, to help grow and share ideas.

He is an Endeavor Entrepreneur (endeavor.org) and very active mentor and angel investor in Latin America. He co-founded Idea.me, a leading crowdfunding site for the region.

Before, he founded Three Melons, a game studio that worked with top media clients like LEGO, Disney, Mattel, Warner Bros and later started its publishing organization and launched Bola, a Facebook soccer game that was played by more than 20 million users (1M daily during the World Cup in 2010).

Three Melons was acquired by Playdom in March 2010, which was later acquired by Disney in August 2010.

milestones.source_description: Playdom Announces Acquisition of Three Melons
